4305390.name: Reaction
4305390.description:
Take control of a gone astray construction ship and navigate a mysterious station in this zero-g 2D action platformer. Master your ship and repair it to avoid the hazards and manoeuvre to the heart of the derelict and uncover the reason for its fate. Can you and your onboard computer assistant make it in, and get out?

This game is a 2D action/puzzle platformer with a unique system of zero-g movement and conservation of momentum making for a uniquely challenging but rewarding platforming experience.
4305390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
